data.title: Presidential Power Map
data.meta_description: The data in this tool reflects donations to campaign committees through Q4 of 2019 and through February 2020 for Super PAC donations. The data only reflects donations to two campaigns’ associated super PACs — Unite the Country for Vice President Joe Biden and VoteVets for Mayor Pete Buttigieg. For more information, please see our methodology.
data.text:
The data in this tool reflects donations to campaign committees through Q4 of 2019 and through February 2020 for Super PAC donations. The data only reflects donations to two campaigns’ associated super PACs — Unite the Country for Vice President Joe Biden and VoteVets for Mayor Pete Buttigieg. For more information, please see our methodology.

The information in this tracker is accurate to the best of our knowledge. This tool is meant to be thorough but it should not be considered comprehensive. If you see anything that you believe is incorrect, have any questions about our methodology, or think we’ve missed something important please let us know by emailing [email protected]

Note: A campaign's pie chart will display the top five sectors from which it received donations. Additional sectors are grouped together in a single slice.
